Version 2.0.95 - Fix Refresh Resume for iSpring LZ-String/Base64 + Rise 360

Bug Fixes

  • Fix refresh resume for all vendors: LMSInitialize wrapper now always installed (was gated behind furthestSlide === null); corrects lesson_location after DB data loads but before content reads it
  • Fix iSpring LZ-String/Base64 resume: post-load navigation via iSpring player API when content resumes at wrong slide from its own suspend_data
  • Fix retry loop skipping format correction: captures vendor format and corrects numeric DB values even when furthestSlide matches localStorage
  • Improve iSpring position bar responsiveness: reduced poller initial delay from 2000ms to 500ms

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.94: Fix suspend_data corruption + resume format for iSpring/Rise 360
  • v2.0.93: Fix iSpring LZ-String position tracking + persist location format for resume
  • v2.0.92: Fix resume format for iSpring/Rise 360 + Storyline retry backing store correction
  • v2.0.91: Fix Storyline resume + remaining parseInt issues for iSpring/Rise 360
